text:
I really appreciate he is coming from a professional to professional stand point and I really hope the lurking professors really take this to account. I currently have a class where it seems like they are planning the course week by week and then rushes the students to complete assignments even starting and ending assignments during the weekend. Work-life balance is a thing for students too.

We need more compassion for each other but from the student's perspective professors really should lead by example.
It's called a hex key or an Allen wrench
